question:
Which of the following are the powers of National Commission for Scheduled Tribes?
1. Summoning and enforcing the attendance of any person from any part of India and examining him on oath.
2. Requisitioning any public record from any court or office.
3. Receiving evidence on affidavits.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Some of the powers of National Commission for Scheduled Tribes: (1) Summoning and enforcing the attendance of any person from any part of India and examining him on oath, (2) Requisitioning any public record from any court or office & (3) Receiving evidence on affidavits.
